name: painted black - scroogle
description:
http://www.scroogle.org
https://ssl.scroogle.org

version: 0.2.7

--[description]

Scroogle.  Light-weight, proxied Google search.  

Polished search pages.
Got the rest of the pages good enough (don't ask).


--[help notes]

This is the selector that adds the "http://" to orange search result URLs:
:not(a) > br + font[color="#008000"]:before
If you use "Linkification" scripts/extensions to change non-link URLs into links, change that selector to this:
:not(a) > br + font[color="#008000"] > a:before
So that the "http://" will be part of the link.


--[multi-part]

I don't always include style code for which I use a global style.  Wondering why your page doesn't match a screenshot?  Check the links under, "See also".  Chances are, the relevant style can be pasted into your copy of this one, if you don't like it to be global.


--[relevant]

See also:
style 3865
http://userstyles.org/styles/search/painted+black
